类 ResourceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.huotu.huobanplus.base.support.BaseResourceController
      • com.huotu.huobanplus.smartui.controller.ResourceController

  • @RestController
 @PreAuthorize(value="hasAnyRole(\'ROOT\',\'SMARTUI\')")
public class ResourceController
extends BaseResourceController
